channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Signal crossing for cycles doesn’t work, 23rd February
item.description:
The signal crossing for bikes travelling towards Churchdown does not work. The button does not light up and there is no change to the flow of traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: ‘Sleeping Policemen’ traffic calming humps Moorend Rd between Greenhills Rd & Sandy Lane roundabout & Pinetrees are breaking up and dangerous for both cyclists and car drivers., 23rd February
item.description:
Moorend Rd from Sandy Lane roundabout to Pinetrees, all four 'sleeping policeman’ traffic calming humps are breaking up and dangerous to road users,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole re-appearing where a repair has been attempted, 23rd February
item.description:
Direction from Asda towards Grace Gardens roundabout, just before roundabout junction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Near Drain Big Hole, 23rd February
item.description:
The hole is around the drain cover. It will cause damage if a car goes into it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Large section of pot holes, 23rd February
item.description:
This area of potholes is an on going issue, still unresolved. It is becoming increasingly dangerous for cyclists and vehicles as both have to swerve to avoid the patch and cross into on coming traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep Potholes at the location, 23rd February
item.description:
Several deep sharp edge potholes at the location. The holes are at the edge of the road as well as in the vehicle track on this single track road. Please can they be filled in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Deep Sharp Edged Potholes at the location, 23rd February
item.description:
The location is Cleeve Common Road - single track. Potholes are at the location just past an entrance gate on the left hand side. Getting impossible to miss. Please can they be filled in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge series of deep potholes, not marked blew my offside tyre out!!, 23rd February
item.description:
There is a series of deep unmarked potholes that are in the direct path of oncoming vehicles. Sat 22 Feb 25 myself and another road user both had blow out punctures. This is extremely dangerous and a immediate threat to public safety!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The surface of the pavement due to fallen leaves making it very slippery, 23rd February
item.description:
Where the temporary traffic lights are on the A40 due to the collapsed bridge the pavement is covered quickly thickly with debris from the fallen leaves etc. It is not pleasant to walk through and is slippery especially when wet (which is most days at present). If it could be cleaned now and again while these temporary lights are there. Pedestrians can cross the road to the other side and back again, but if you are elderly or children rushing to school you are not going to do that.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 314, London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
